r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added
- Yii 2 support #624, #630 - Enable tracing when no autoloaders used by setting `DD_TRACE_NO_AUTOLOADER=true` #627 - Safe to-string conversion for all datatypes on `DDTrace\SpanData` #613
### Changed
- Improve dd-doctor with and container tagging detector when open_basedir is set #629
